quotes.title: Do not dwell in the past
quotes.content: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.content: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
quotes.author: Marie Curie

quotes.content: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
quotes.author: William Wallace

quotes.content: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein
